title: Legitimacy as acceptance of right to rule

content.question: A political regime is considered to be legitimate when

choices.label: citizens stop paying attention to political events
citizens support almost all policy decisions of the government
citizens refuse to obey any unpopular laws
citizens accept the government’s right to rule

content.answer: citizens accept the government’s right to rule

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
